articles.content: Gold and silver prices in India fell today as US elections headed towards a tight finish. On MCX, December gold futures were down 0.85% to 51,160 per 10 gram while silver rates slumped 2% to 61,380 p… [+1938 chars]

articles.title: Wednesday's top brokerage calls: Sun Pharma and Adani Ports - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Among brokerages, Morgan Stanley and Nomura were bullish on Sun Pharma after the company reported its September quarter results while CLSA and Nomura maintained 'buy' calls on Adani Ports on Q2 results.Get latest Market online at cnbctv18.com

articles.title: 10 things you need to know before the opening bell on November 4 - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The Indian market is likely to remain volatile on Wednesday as investors will keenly watch developments over the results of the US presidential elections. At 7:35 am, the SGX Nifty was trading 46.75 points or 0.39 percent lower at 11,802.50, indicating a nega…

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Oil climbs as U.S. stockpiles shrink, but election uncertainty overshadows market - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. oil prices jumped more than 2% on Wednesday after industry data showed crude inventories in the United States dropped sharply and as investors awaited results from the tumultuous presidential election.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
TOKYO, Nov 4 (Reuters) - U.S. oil prices jumped more than 2% on Wednesday after industry data showed crude inventories in the United States dropped sharply and as investors awaited … [+1971 chars]
